verses.name: Proverbs 7:21
verses.text: With her much fair speech she caused him to yield, with the flattering of her lips she forced him.

verses.name: Proverbs 7:22
verses.text: He goeth after her straightway, as an ox goeth to the slaughter, or as a fool to the correction of the stocks;

verses.name: Proverbs 7:23
verses.text: Till a dart strike through his liver; as a bird hasteth to the snare, and knoweth not that it is for his life.

verses.name: Proverbs 7:24
verses.text: Hearken unto me now therefore, O ye children, and attend to the words of my mouth.

verses.name: Proverbs 7:25
verses.text: Let not thine heart decline to her ways, go not astray in her paths.
